Thesis: app-specific chains with their own consensus that do one job, e.g. Bitcoin  Antithesis: general-purpose chains that run every apps on a shared "world computer", e.g. Ethereum  Synthesis: app-specific chains that share a secure consensus layer, e.g. Cosmos + @lazyledger_io
